text: Andrew Mackay may refer to: * Andrew Mackay (mathematician) (1760–1809), Scottish mathematician * William Andrew MacKay, (1929–2013), Canadian lawyer * Andy Mackay (born 1946), English musician, founder of Roxy Music * Andrew MacKay (born 1949), British Conservative politician * Andrew Mackay (British Army officer), British Army major general * Andy McKay (born 1980), New Zealand cricketer * Andrew Mackay (swimmer) (born 1985), Olympic swimmer from the Cayman Islands
title: Andrew Mackay
